definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Job 37:2 a rumbling, growling, moaning:—´[[ה]] abs. Ez Eze 2:10 + 2 t.;—
a rumbling, growling sound [[מִפִּיו יֵחֵא]] ´[[וְה]] Job 37:2 of thunder, as sound going forth from God's mouth.
a moaning [[וׇהִי]] ´[[קִינִים וׇה]] Ez Eze 2:10 lamentations and moaning and woe.
a sigh or moan, as transient, [[כִּלִּינוּ שָׁנֵינוּ]] [[כְמוֹ־הֶָגֶה]] Ps 90:9 we bring our years to an end as a sign, i.e. a fleeting sound (cf. RVm VB).
